result.execSummary:
The defendant Glenn E Rhodes was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Burglary-Building or Dwelling, a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.10(1m)(a).
  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Original SENTENCING HEARING Transcript (23 pages) commencing JANUARY 30, 2015 received and filed. kl

Defendant Glenn E Rhodes in court with attorney Patrick Dennis Wait.  Defendant Glenn E Rhodes in custody.  Irene Elizabeth Parthum appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PSI reviewed and corrections made.  

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  

As to Count 1:
The Court sentenced the defendant to a MAXIMUM TERM OF IMPRISONMENT of 5.5 YEARS with 291 days credit CONCURRENT to any other sentence and CONCURRENT to count 2; the INITIAL TERM OF CONFINEMENT in the Wisconsin State Prison System is 2.5 YEARS; the MAXIMUM TERM OF EXTENDED SUPERVISION is 3 YEARS.

As to Count 2:
The Court sentenced the defendant to 9 MONTHS in the House of Corrections with 291 days credit CONCURRENT to any other sentence and CONCURRENT to count 1.

Court finds defendant IS NOT eligible for the Challenge Incarceration program but IS eligible for the WI Substance Abuse program.  

Conditions of Extended Supervision:
-  Mental health unit supervision.
- AODA assessment and cooperate with any programs deemed necessary by the probation department.
- Absolute/maintain sobriety, no alcohol, no drugs.
- No possession/consumption/selling/distribution of illegal drugs/alcohol.
- Random urine screens.
- Agent to determine if it is appropriate for defendant to participate in education, vocational training and/or work.
- No contact with any victim named in complaint for case#s 13CF4792, 14CF1169 and 14CF1572.
- Provide a DNA sample.
- Follow all rules of supervision and follow through with any other treatment deemed necessary by the department.

Court ordered the defendant pay all of the following by the end of supervision.  Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment:
Restitution in the amount of $472.25 payable to Kasey K.- FIRST PRIORITY.
All court costs, fees, and surcharges (including DNA); 
All applicable fees of supervision.
-  No Cash Bail Posted in this matter 
-  Court ordered that all court costs, fines, surcharges and/or restitution be paid through collection by the Department of Corrections from 25% of funds under Sec. 973.05(4)(b) and as a condition of extended supervision. DOC shall collect those sums.  

Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm. 
Court advised defendant of his right to seek postconviction relief.
Court advised defendant that he may not vote until his civil rights have been restored.  

Filed:  
Written Explanation of Determinate Sentence 
Victim Impact Statement    
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
Ineligible Voting Notice & Acknowledgement
Pre-trial Incarceration Credit

Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.

Defendant Glenn E Rhodes in court with attorney Patrick D. Wait.  Defendant Glenn E Rhodes in custody.  Thomas Potter for Irene Elizabeth Parthum appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
 As to Counts 1 and 2:
  Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, plead GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Court found defendant guilty as charged in the Information and ordered entry of Judgment of Conviction.  
Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm.  Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended, and may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored.

Court Orders PSI report.  Order for Presentence Investigation Report (PSI) signed and FILED.

Jury trial scheduled for 12/01/2014 is ordered vacated.  Case is adjourned for sentencing in Branch 22.  Court ordered defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department. Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Patrick D. Wait in court, defendant Glenn E Rhodes not in court, in custody.  Irene Elizabeth Parthum appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for plea hearing, however Court in Jury Trial.  Case remains calendared in Branch 22.  Plea hearing scheduled for November 26, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Patrick D. Wait in court, defendant Glenn E Rhodes not in court, in custody.  Irene Elizabeth Parthum appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for final pre-trial, defense requests plea hearing date prior to the jury trial.  Case remains calendared in Branch 22.  Plea hearing scheduled for November 24, 2014 at 01:15 pm.
Notice of Motion and Motion for Joinder filed and received.
Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND due 12/22/2014.

Attorney Patrick D. Wait in court, defendant Glenn E Rhodes not in court, in custody.  Irene Elizabeth Parthum appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for scheduling conference, defense requests final pre-trial and jury trial dates.  Case remains calendared in Branch 22.  Final pre-trial scheduled for November 17, 2014 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for December 1, 2014 at 09:00 am.

Attorney Patrick D. Wait in court, defendant Glenn E Rhodes not in court, in custody.  Irene Elizabeth Parthum appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case in court for status conference.  Defense requests more time.  State will not allow any additional status or scheduling dates, case must be scheduled for jury trial or plea at next court date.  Case remains calendared in Branch 22.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 23, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Patrick D. Wait in court, defendant Glenn E Rhodes not in court, in custody.  Michael Lonski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
For reasons stated off the record to the Court, and with the agreement of all parties, Status Conference scheduled for a later date in Branch 22.  Status conference scheduled for 09-04-2014 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Patrick D Wait in court, defendant Glenn E Rhodes not in court, in custody.  Michael Lonski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
For reasons stated off the record to the Court, and with the agreement of all parties, Plea Hearing adjourned to a later date in Branch 22.  Plea hearing scheduled for 08-04-2014 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Patrick D Wait in court, defendant Glenn E Rhodes not in court, in custody.  Janet C Protasiewicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Plea hearing scheduled for 07-03-2014 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Glenn E Rhodes not in court, defendant in custody.  Janet C Protasiewicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court received call from Attorney Patrick Waite prior to the start of afternoon hearings.  For medical reasons, he is unable to appear on today.  Pretrial Conference adjourned to a later date in Branch 22.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for 06-11-2014 at 01:30 pm.
As to 13CF4792,14CF1169, and 14CF1572, from Glenn Rhodes, FILED in 13CF4792.

Defendant Glenn E Rhodes in court with attorney Patrick D Wait.  Defendant Glenn E Rhodes in custody.  Janet C Protasiewicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Witkowiak, Branch 22.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant plead not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 29, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Court orders defendant TURNED OVER to JUSTICE Point for Supervision and Electronic Monitoring.  To be monitored by drug testing.
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Kasey K. and the address of 933 N. Marshall St., Milwaukee, WI.

Defendant Glenn E Rhodes in court with attorney Danielle L Shelton.  Defendant Glenn E Rhodes in custody.  Carole R Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Witkowiak, Branch 22.  Complaint was read aloud by the State per defense request.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 23, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
